item.description: Latin Dance lessons - Dance party Salsa, Cumbia, & other Latin American dances.  Please bring a snack or dessert to share with the group.  We will have time to chat for about 45 minutes and then dance the night away.  If you need directions the night of the event you can call Karen at 860-922-7997 or Kurt at 860-978-0851.  Vengan listas a bailar van a ser instuctores para que ensenan todos que quieren esta noche.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the community room in the back of the library!

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Latin Dance Party
